data.prayer: Please, teach the 730,966 believers in Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 3,071,734 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.focus_label: Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Kongo-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 3,802,700.

We estimate Kongo-Central has 730,966 people who might know Jesus, 2,754,098 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 317,636 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 3,802,700 souls in Kongo-Central and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
